Package gw.api.rest.exceptions

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    RequestErrorDetails  
    RequestErrorInfo
    This class represents a standardized error format for returning error details to an end user as the response body of a 4xx or 5xx error.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BadInputException
    This exception helper class maps to a 400 ("Bad Request") exception.
    CorsException  
    InternalServerErrorException  
    NotAcceptableException
    Exception that indicates a failure in content negotiation, i.e. the client specified an "Accept" header that doesn't match any type that this API produces.
    NotAuthorizedException
    Will return an HTTP 403 to the user, indicating that they're not authorized for the requested resource.
    NotFoundException  
    OperationNotSupportedException  
    RestAuthenticationException
    This exception indicates an authentication failure, which will be reported back to the client with a 401 Unauthorized status code.
    RestExceptionWithErrorInfo  
    RestRequestException  
    ServiceUnavailableException
    Exception that maps to a 503 error, used for when the service is unavailable (for example, because the server is not at the required runlevel)
    UnsupportedContentTypeException
